price: 37.Kaadu Nabii Nuuc mari sinni farmoyta dirabboyseeh, wohul Yallih farmoytit inkih dirabboyse тага yekken waqdi maggo leet ken xuumusneeh, ken xuumusiyya sinaamah kas elle geyan astá abne, kaadu daalimiinih (koros kinnuk) qansaru-le digaalá massosne Qhiyaamah ayró.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ لَّمَّا كَذَّبُواْ ٱلرُّسُلَ أَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ لِلنَّاسِ ءَايَةٗۖ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
